scripts.clean-install: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.npmpack: npm run clean-install && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-common-web-1.0.0.tgz && npx shx cp -rL package/** ../../tagspaces2/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-common-web && rimraf package
scripts.pkg-publish: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm install && npm publish --access public
